content: Answer me in Your faithfulness, and in Your righteousness.
And do not enter into judgment with Your servant,
For in Your sight no man living is righteous  justified.
For the enemy has persecuted me,
He has crushed my life down to the ground;
He has made me dwell in dark places, like those who have been long dead.
Therefore my spirit is overwhelmed  weak within me [wrapped in darkness];
My heart grows numb within me.
